## path() function

Apply props for path-based marks to a selection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function path(selection: Selection<Element, any, Element, any>, child: Area | Arc): Selection<Element, any, Element, any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  selection | Selection&lt;Element, any, Element, any&gt; | the d3 selection |
|  child | Area \| Arc | the child block |

<b>Returns:</b>

Selection&lt;Element, any, Element, any&gt;
